verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] Al-tashheth. A Psalm of Asaph, a Song.) We give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee, O God, <S%H430><s%> we give <S%H3034><s%> thanks, <S%H3034><s%> For Thy name <S%H8034><s%> is near; <S%H7138><s%> Men declare <S%H5608><s%> Thy wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works. <S%H6381><s%>
"When <S%H3588><s%> I select <S%H3947><s%> an appointed <S%H4150><s%> time, <S%H4150><s%> It is I who judge <S%H8199><s%> with equity. <S%H4339><s%>
"The earth <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in it melt; <S%H4127><s%> It is I who have firmly <S%H8505><s%> set <S%H8505><s%> its pillars. <S%H5982><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
"I said <S%H559><s%> to the boastful, <S%H1984><s%> 'Do not boast, <S%H1984><s%>' And to the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> 'Do not lift <S%H7311><s%> up the horn; <S%H7161><s%>
Do not lift <S%H7311><s%> up your horn <S%H7161><s%> on high, <S%H4791><s%> Do not speak <S%H1696><s%> with insolent <S%H6277><s%> pride. <S%H6677><s%>' "
For not from the east, <S%H4161><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> from the west, <S%H4628><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> from the desert <S%H4057><s%> [comes] exaltation; <S%H7311><s%>
But God <S%H430><s%> is the Judge; <S%H8199><s%> He puts <S%H8213><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> one, <S%H2088><s%> and exalts <S%H7311><s%> another. <S%H2088><s%>

For a cup <S%H3563><s%> is in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and the wine <S%H3196><s%> foams; <S%H2560><s%> It is well <S%H4392><s%> mixed, <S%H4538><s%> and He pours <S%H5064><s%> out of this; <S%H2088><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> must drain <S%H4680><s%> [and] drink <S%H8354><s%> down <S%H8354><s%> its dregs. <S%H8105><s%>
But as for me, I will declare <S%H5046><s%> [it] forever; <S%H5769><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> He will cut <S%H1438><s%> off, <S%H1438><s%> [But] the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will be lifted <S%H7311><s%> up.
